CAF_Notes: Approximately 27% of DCM probands had possible or likely disease-causing variants identified.

CAF_Notes: This disorder is caused by mutations in the genes coding for the low-density lipoprotein receptor (LDLR), apolipoprotein B (APOB), and proprotein convertase subtilisin/kexin 9 (PCSK9). However, in 41% of the cases, we cannot find mutations in these genes.
